net.tridentsdk

Class Trident

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.Trident

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class Trident
extends Object
    Utility static accessor which delegates to the Server
    Since:
    0.3-alpha-DP
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team
